page.title: 03Places of Worship
page.content:
Tatworth has four places of worship. The Anglican Church of St John the Evangelist, situated on the edge of the village nearest Chard, has a Priest-in-Charge. A Church Room, for use by the community, has recently been erected by voluntary labour.
Tatworth Baptist Chapel is at Chard Junction, and the Strict Baptists have a chapel in School Lane.
The South Chard Christian Church, also in School Lane, offers a less formal gospel-style worship and attracts people from all over the country.
